title: Model
description: Schema for submitting a predictive model file set. Models contain software files that could be used to generate predictions or annotations of genomic features.

not.comment: Model file sets should not specify any donors or samples.

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: The custom lab name given to this predictive model.

model_version.title: Model Version
model_version.description: The semantic version number for this predictive model file set.

model_type.title: Model Type
model_type.description: The category that best describes this predictive model file set.

prediction_objects.title: Prediction Objects
prediction_objects.description: The objects this predictive model is targeting.

items.title: Prediction Object
items.description: An object this predictive model is targeting.

input_file_sets.title: Input File Sets
input_file_sets.description: The file set(s) that served as inputs for the derivation of this model.

items.title: Input File Set
items.description: A file set that serves as input for the derivation of this model.

model_zoo_location.title: Model Zoo Location
model_zoo_location.description: The link to the model on the Kipoi repository.

software_version.title: Software Version
software_version.description: Version of software used for the derivation of this model.

samples.comment: Do not submit. Model file sets should not specify any samples.

donors.comment: Do not submit. Model file sets should not specify any donors.
